name: AmazonSleepSounds
0:
”Alexa, open amazon sleep sounds”
”Alexa, start amazon sleep sounds”
”Alexa, ask amazon sleep sounds to play a rain sound”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: amazon sleep sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ambient Sounds:
 
Listen to a collection of popular ambient sleep sounds, that can be played for up to 12 consecutive hours, to help your child fall and stay asleep throughout the night. Amazon Kids+ subscribers receive unlimited access to full collection of sounds and soundscapes and non-Amazon Kids+ subscribers can listen to two pre-selected two sounds and soundscapes for free.
 
Available sounds include:
-Rain Sounds
-Ocean Sounds
-Thunderstorm Sounds
-Babbling Brook
-White Noise
-Brown Noise
-Pink Noise
-Jungle Sounds
 
Soundscapes:
 
Listen to exclusive AI-generated remixes of any of our high-quality ambient sleep sounds for a more dynamic listening experience – e.g. choose “Rain Soundscape” to listen to rain sounds layered with a peaceful piano melody or “White Noise Soundscape” to listen to white noise harmonized with the soft chimes of bells.
 
Just say “Alexa, open amazon sleep sounds” to get started!
